message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14000.
I'm interested in the product, but $14000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12000 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand that $12000 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I can meet you halfway at $13000.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $13000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $11500 for the product. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
I understand that $11500 is still a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to make another compromise. I can offer you a slight discount to $12500. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
